card.name: SimplySAVE SBI Card
card.description: A credit card offering unlimited privileges including reward points on spends, fuel surcharge waiver, and worldwide acceptance.
card.target_audience: Personal users looking for rewards on shopping, dining, movies, departmental stores, grocery spends, and fuel surcharge waiver.

categories.name: Dining, Movies, Departmental Stores, Grocery Spends
categories.description: Earn 10 Reward Points per Rs 150 spent on these categories.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Reward Points earned at 4 points = Rs. 1 value.
categories.how_to_earn: Spend Rs 150 in the specified categories to earn 10 points.

categories.name: Other spends
categories.description: Earn 1 Reward Point per Rs 150 spent on all other spends.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Reward Points earned at 4 points = Rs. 1 value.
categories.how_to_earn: Spend Rs 150 on other categories to earn 1 point.

bonus_rates.condition: Spend Rs. 2,000 or more in first 60 days
bonus_rates.validity: Within 60 days of receiving the card
bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Bonus Points credited within 60 days of eligible transactions; valid only for new SimplySAVE SBI Card holders; not applicable on cash withdrawals, balance transfer, and easy money draft spends.

redemption.option: Redeem against gifts or pay outstanding balance
redemption.process: Use Reward Points to pay outstanding balance or redeem through Rewards Catalogue.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Reward Redemption fee applicable on every redemption request.

benefits.name: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: Get freedom from paying the 1% fuel surcharge at any petrol pump in India.
benefits.how_to_avail: Transact between Rs. 500 to Rs. 3,000 at any petrol pump.
benefits.value: Maximum surcharge waiver of up to Rs. 100 per statement cycle.
benefits.usage_limit: Up to Rs. 100 waiver per statement cycle

benefits.name: Contactless Advantage
benefits.description: Make daily purchases easy and secure with Visa payWave contactless technology.
benefits.how_to_avail: Wave card at a secure reader for small ticket purchases.
benefits.value: Fast and convenient transactions without handing over card.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Unique security key ensures only one transaction goes through even if card is waved multiple times.

benefits.name: Global Usage
benefits.description: Use your SimplySAVE SBI Card in over 24 million outlets worldwide including 3,25,000 outlets in India.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use card at any outlet accepting Visa or MasterCard.

benefits.name: Add-on Cards for Family
benefits.description: Empower family members with add-on cards for parents, spouse, children or siblings above 18 years.
benefits.how_to_avail: Apply for add-on cards linked to primary SimplySAVE SBI Card.

benefits.name: Cash on the Go
benefits.description: Withdraw cash from over 1 million Visa or MasterCard ATMs globally.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use SimplySAVE SBI Card at ATMs worldwide.

benefits.name: Utility Bill Payment Facility
benefits.description: Pay electricity, telephone, mobile and other utility bills using Easy Bill Pay facility.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use SimplySAVE SBI Card for utility bill payments.

benefits.name: Balance Transfer on EMI
benefits.description: Transfer outstanding balances from other banksâ€™ credit cards to SimplySAVE SBI Card and pay back in EMIs at lower interest rates.
benefits.how_to_avail: Log on to sbicard.com with user ID and password to avail service.
benefits.value: Lower interest rate on balance transfer.

benefits.name: Flexipay Installments
benefits.description: Convert transactions of Rs. 2,500 or more into easy monthly installments.
benefits.how_to_avail: Log in to sbicard.com within 30 days of purchase to convert transaction into Flexipay.

current_offers.title: Extravaganza Offer
current_offers.description: Spend Rs. 2,000 or more in first 60 days and get 2,000 bonus Reward Points.
current_offers.validity: Within 60 days of receiving the card
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Valid only for new SimplySAVE SBI Card holders; not valid on cash withdrawals, balance transfer, and easy money draft spends; bonus points credited within 60 days of eligible transactions; maximum 2000 points per account.
current_offers.eligibility: New SimplySAVE SBI Card holders only
current_offers.exclusions: Cash withdrawals, balance transfer, easy money draft spends

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Renewal Fee reversed if annual spends for last year >= Rs. 1,00,000
fees_and_charges.frequency: Per annum from second year onwards
